definition: jasper/fine jade/beautiful/exquisite (e.g. wine, food)/abbr. for Hainan province
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: If you visit Qionghai, please don't forget to taste Jiaji Duck.
sentences.chinese: 如果你来琼海，请别忘记尝一尝嘉积鸭。

sentences.english: Jiaji Duck is one of the four famous Hainan dishes, which is popular with people in Qionghai.
sentences.chinese: 嘉积鸭是海南四大名菜之一，深受琼海人喜欢。

sentences.english: If you visit Qionghai please don't forget to taste Jiaji Duck.
sentences.chinese: 假如你来琼海，请别忘记尝一尝嘉积鸭。

sentences.english: If you visit Qionghai, please don't forget to taste Jiaji Duck.
sentences.chinese: 假如你来琼海，请别忘怀尝一尝嘉积鸭。

sentences.english: I suggest you taste Jiaji Duck if you visit Qionghai.
sentences.chinese: 来了琼海一定要尝尝加积鸭。

sentences.english: Boao is a town in Qionghai. It is the seat of the Boao Asia Forum.
sentences.chinese: 博鳌是琼海的一个镇，也是博鳌亚洲论坛的永久会址。

sentences.english: Boao is the seat of the Boao Aisa Forum, which is situated in Qionghai City.
sentences.chinese: 博鳌位于琼海，博鳌亚洲论坛设立在此。
